original_title: Qigong: Energy Workouts for Body and Mind (Wuji Short Form)
overview: Francesco Garripoli and Daisy Lee-Garripoli guide viewers through a moving meditation of gentle, flowing qigong poses; deep breathing; and visualization techniques to enhance the flow of qi. The style of qigong is called wuji qigong or  primordial qigong.
title: Qigong: Energy Workouts for Body and Mind (Wuji Short Form)
